about_the_game:
This is the demo version of 'siX Planes'!

You can learn the basic controls in the Tutorial and play the first half of Stage 01.

Your save data will be carried over, so after playing the demo, you can continue with the full version.
detailed_description:
This is the demo version of 'siX Planes'!

You can learn the basic controls in the Tutorial and play the first half of Stage 01.

Your save data will be carried over, so after playing the demo, you can continue with the full version.
name: siX Planes Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is the demo version of 'siX Planes'! You can learn the basic controls in the Tutorial and play the first half of Stage 01. Your save data will be carried over, so after playing the demo, you can continue with the full version.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
